lines.text: Maybe it was... to hide how he actually died.
That <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum</c> spell- maybe they used it to kill him <c=#FF00FF>some other way!</c>
And they... wanted to hide that cause of death, by blaming the fire.
...Hm. Sounds plausible, now that I think about it.
But what's that actual cause of death? Is there some evidence <c=#FF00FF>on the body</c> that'd give it away?
